languages.text: "Да! Я бросилась к Теодоре сразу, как смогла снова ходить, говорила, что мы должны вернуться на Салис Прайм и защитить святыню от еретиков. Но мне было сказано, что варп уничтожил старый маршрут к планете, а новый строить было долго и тяжело. Как будто есть дела важнее, чем защита веры и истребление слуг Архиврага!"

traits.locale_text: "Да! Я бросилась к Теодоре сразу как смогла снова ходить, говорила, что мы должны вернуться на Салис Прайм и защитить святыню от еретиков. Но мне было сказано, что варп уничтожил старый маршрут к планете, а новый строить было долго и тяжело. Как-будто есть дела важнее чем защиты веры и истребление слуг Архиврага!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Yes! I rushed to Theodora the moment I could walk again, and I insisted on going back to Salis Prime to defend the relic from the heretics. But I was told that the warp had destroyed the old route to the planet and that plotting a new one would take a great deal of time and effort. As if there could be anything more important than protecting the faith and hunting down servants of the Archenemy!"
languages.original_text: "Да! Я бросилась к Теодоре сразу, как смогла снова ходить, говорила, что мы должны вернуться на Салис Прайм и защитить святыню от еретиков. Но мне было сказано, что варп уничтожил старый маршрут к планете, а новый строить было долго и тяжело. Как будто есть дела важнее, чем защита веры и истребление слуг Архиврага!"

traits.locale_text: "Right! I came to Theodora the moment I could walk again, I insisted on going back to Salis Prime to defend the relic from the heretics. But I was told that the warp had destroyed the old route to the planet and that plotting a new one would take a great deal of time and effort. As if there could be anything more important than protecting the faith and hunting down servants of the Archenemy!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

As if there could be anything more important than protecting the faith and hunting down servants of the Archenemy!"

As if there could be anything more important than protecting the faith and hunting down servants of the Archenemy!"

traits.locale_text: "Yes! I rushed to Theodora the moment I could walk again, and I insisted on going back to Salis Prime to defend the relic from the heretics. But I was told that the warp had destroyed the old route to the planet and that plotting a new one would take a great deal of time and effort. As if there could be anything more important than protecting the faith and hunting down servants of the Archenemy!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “没错！我刚刚能重新站起来，就立刻冲到了西奥多拉那里，坚持要返回萨利斯主星，从异端分子手中守护圣物。但她告诉我，通往那颗行星的亚空间路线已经被破坏了，寻找新的航线需要消耗大量的时间与精力。这话说得，就好像有什么事情能比守护信仰，猎杀混沌大敌的仆从更重要似的！”
languages.original_text: "Yes! I rushed to Theodora the moment I could walk again, and I insisted on going back to Salis Prime to defend the relic from the heretics. But I was told that the warp had destroyed the old route to the planet and that plotting a new one would take a great deal of time and effort. As if there could be anything more important than protecting the faith and hunting down servants of the Archenemy!"

traits.locale_text: “没错！我刚刚能重新站起来，就立刻冲到了西奥多拉那里，坚持要返回萨利斯主星，从异端分子手中守护圣物。但她告诉我，通往那颗行星的亚空间路线已经被破坏了，寻找新的航线需要消耗大量的时间与精力。这话说得，就好像有什么事情能比守护信仰，猎杀混沌大敌的仆从更重要似的！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Así es! Acudí a Theodora en cuanto pude volver a andar e insistí en la necesidad de volver a Salis Prime para proteger la reliquia de los herejes. Pero me dijo que la disformidad había destruido la antigua ruta y trazar una nueva requeriría demasiado tiempo y esfuerzo. ¡Como si hubiera algo más importante que proteger la fe y dar caza a los siervos del Archienemigo!».
languages.original_text: "Yes! I rushed to Theodora the moment I could walk again, and I insisted on going back to Salis Prime to defend the relic from the heretics. But I was told that the warp had destroyed the old route to the planet and that plotting a new one would take a great deal of time and effort. As if there could be anything more important than protecting the faith and hunting down servants of the Archenemy!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Así es! Acudí a Theodora en cuanto pude volver a andar e insistí en la necesidad de volver a Salis Prime para proteger la reliquia de los herejes. Pero me dijo que la disformidad había destruido la antigua ruta y trazar una nueva requeriría demasiado tiempo y esfuerzo. ¡Como si hubiera algo más importante que proteger la fe y dar caza a los siervos del Archienemigo!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「そうだ！我は歩けるようになった瞬間にシオドーラのもとに駆けつけ、異端者から聖遺物を守るためにサリス・プライムへ戻ることを主張しました。しかし、歪みによって惑星への古いルートは破壊され、新しいルートを作るには膨大な時間と労力がかかると聞かされた。信仰を守り、渾沌の勢力のしもべを追い詰めることよりも重要なことがあるかのように、そう宣ったのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Yes! I rushed to Theodora the moment I could walk again, and I insisted on going back to Salis Prime to defend the relic from the heretics. But I was told that the warp had destroyed the old route to the planet and that plotting a new one would take a great deal of time and effort. As if there could be anything more important than protecting the faith and hunting down servants of the Archenemy!"

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ！我は歩けるようになった瞬間にシオドーラのもとに駆けつけ、異端者から聖遺物を守るためにサリス・プライムへ戻ることを主張しました。しかし、歪みによって惑星への古いルートは破壊され、新しいルートを作るには膨大な時間と労力がかかると聞かされた。信仰を守り、渾沌の勢力のしもべを追い詰めることよりも重要なことがあるかのように、そう宣ったのだ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ja! Ich bin zu Theodora geeilt, sobald ich wieder gehen konnte, und habe darauf bestanden, nach Salis Prime zurückzukehren, um das Relikt gegen die Ketzer zu verteidigen. Aber es hieß, der Warp hätte die alte Route zu dem Planeten zerstört, und die Berechnung einer neuen wäre sehr zeitaufwendig und mühsam. Als gäbe es etwas Wichtigeres als den Schutz des Glaubens und die Jagd auf Diener des Erzfeinds!"
languages.original_text: "Yes! I rushed to Theodora the moment I could walk again, and I insisted on going back to Salis Prime to defend the relic from the heretics. But I was told that the warp had destroyed the old route to the planet and that plotting a new one would take a great deal of time and effort. As if there could be anything more important than protecting the faith and hunting down servants of the Archenemy!"

traits.locale_text: "Ja! Ich bin zu Theodora geeilt, sobald ich wieder gehen konnte, und habe darauf bestanden, nach Salis Prime zurückzukehren, um das Relikt gegen die Ketzer zu verteidigen. Aber es hieß, der Warp hätte die alte Route zu dem Planeten zerstört, und die Berechnung einer neuen wäre sehr zeitaufwendig und mühsam. Als gäbe es etwas Wichtigeres als den Schutz des Glaubens und die Jagd auf Diener des Erzfeinds!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Oui ! Dès que j'ai pu me lever, je suis allée voir Théodora et j'ai insisté pour que nous retournions sur Salis Primus afin de défendre la relique contre les hérétiques. Malheureusement, on m'a dit que le Warp avait détruit la route menant à la planète et qu'il faudrait beaucoup de temps et d'effort pour en établir une nouvelle. Comme s'il y avait plus important que protéger la foi et chasser les serviteurs du Grand Ennemi ! »
languages.original_text: "Yes! I rushed to Theodora the moment I could walk again, and I insisted on going back to Salis Prime to defend the relic from the heretics. But I was told that the warp had destroyed the old route to the planet and that plotting a new one would take a great deal of time and effort. As if there could be anything more important than protecting the faith and hunting down servants of the Archenemy!"

traits.locale_text: « Oui ! Dès que j'ai pu me lever, je suis allée voir Théodora et j'ai insisté pour que nous retournions sur Salis Primus afin de défendre la relique contre les hérétiques. Malheureusement, on m'a dit que le Warp avait détruit la route menant à la planète et qu'il faudrait beaucoup de temps et d'effort pour en établir une nouvelle. Comme s'il y avait plus important que protéger la foi et chasser les serviteurs du Grand Ennemi ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Doğru anlamışsın. Ayağa kalkar kalkmaz Theodora'nın yanında bittim. Salis Prime'a dönüp yadigârı kâfirlerden koruma konusunda ısrarcı oldum. Ancak öteboyut, gezegene giden yolu yok etmişti. Yeni bir rota planlamanın çok zaman ve kaynak gerektireceğini söylediler. Sanki kutsal inancımızı koruyup Şerbaşı'nın hizmetkârlarını ortadan kaldırmaktan daha elzem, daha şerefli bir görev var da..."
languages.original_text: "Yes! I rushed to Theodora the moment I could walk again, and I insisted on going back to Salis Prime to defend the relic from the heretics. But I was told that the warp had destroyed the old route to the planet and that plotting a new one would take a great deal of time and effort. As if there could be anything more important than protecting the faith and hunting down servants of the Archenemy!"

traits.locale_text: "Doğru anlamışsın. Ayağa kalkar kalkmaz Theodora'nın yanında bittim. Salis Prime'a dönüp yadigârı kâfirlerden koruma konusunda ısrarcı oldum. Ancak öteboyut, gezegene giden yolu yok etmişti. Yeni bir rota planlamanın, çok zaman ve kaynak gerektireceğini söylediler. Kutsal inancımızı koruyup Şerbaşı'nın hizmetkârlarını ortadan kaldırmaktan daha elzem, daha şerefli bir görev olabilir mi?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
